common

Interface IConnect

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IConnect
extends java.rmi.Remote

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String BOUND_NAME
      The name the ICompute object will be bound to in the RMI Registry
      static int BOUND_PORT
      The port that the client will use to communicate with the ICompute object Note that this port must be opened of inbound traffic on the server machine

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.HashSet<IChatroom> getChatrooms()
      get a HashSet of chatrooms from this IUser
      ADataPacketAlgoCmd<java.lang.String,?,IUser> getNewCommand(RequestForAlgo request)
      Get a command to handle a packet we've never seen before IMPORTANT -- this function is synchronous, which means that the thread which executed this command will be blocked until the remote user returns a new ADataPacketAlgoCmd.
      IUser getUser(IConnect stub) 
      void sendReceive(IUser me, ADataPacket data)
      process the data sent by the remote application.

       throws java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getChatrooms

        java.util.HashSet<IChatroom> getChatrooms()
                                   throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        get a HashSet of chatrooms from this IUser
        Returns:
        a HashSet of chatrooms corresponding to this user
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • sendReceive

        void sendReceive(IUser me,
                 ADataPacket data)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        process the data sent by the remote application. Most of the time, the implementation of this function will just be "data.execute(myVisitor,me);"
        Parameters:
        IUser - - the user who sent the message
        ADataPacket - - the data packet that they sent
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getNewCommand

        ADataPacketAlgoCmd<java.lang.String,?,IUser> getNewCommand(RequestForAlgo request)
                                                    throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get a command to handle a packet we've never seen before IMPORTANT -- this function is synchronous, which means that the thread which executed this command will be blocked until the remote user returns a new ADataPacketAlgoCmd. it is highly recommended that this is only run inside of a new thread. The new commands are parameterized to take an IUser representing the message sender as input and return a String status message
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
